items.sentence: Tom wanted to give Mary a goodbye kiss, but he thought maybe he shouldn\'t.
Tom was trying to tell Mary something important, but she wasn\'t listening.
Tom Jackson is considered to be one of the most dangerous men in Australia.
Tom and Mary always talk about the same old things. It gets kind of boring.
Tom asked for police protection after Mary and John threatened to kill him.
Tom attracted a crowd of children as soon as he started playing his bongos.
Do you really think you can learn to speak French fluently in three months?
From my point of view, Australia is one of the best countries in the world.
One of Tom\'s favorite meals is a grilled cheese sandwich with tomato soup.
She advised him to cut down on smoking, but he didn\'t think that he could.
